TEXT.TITLE: COOPER LASER <ZAPS> RESCHEDULES ANNUAL MEETING
TEXT.BODY: Cooper LaserSonics Inc said it rescheduled its annual meeting to Monday, May 11, at the company's office in Santa Clara, Calif. The meeting had previously been set for May 14 in Palo Alto, the company said. Reuter
